attributes.action: Ban all HGV'S from entering Greater London!
attributes.background: Londons roads can no longer facilitate the ever increasing numbers of road users. Cyclists are being injured and killed more frequently.

rejection.details:
This issue is the responsibility of Transport for London who are accountable to the London Assembly. 

You may wish to consider contacting TfL (https://tfl.gov.uk/help-and-contact/) or the London Assembly about this issue. The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: 
 
https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
